name: DDRunner
description:
Holy moly, you overslept for your art exam?!
Grab your sketchbook and run! Be careful - if you miss the beat, you may run into someone and lose some precious time by picking your notebook. Which one was yours, anyway?

This short game was designed by our cat. We tried.

Music: Energetic Upbeat by WinnieTheMoog
Link: https://filmmusic.io/song/6033-energetic-upbeat
License: https://filmmusic.io/standard-license
